fiftyone.mobile.detection.webapp
Class ShareUsage

java.lang.Object
  fiftyone.mobile.detection.webapp.ShareUsage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ShareUsage
extends Object
implements Runnable

Class used to record usage information which is essential to ensuring 51Degrees.mobi is optimised for performance and accuracy for current devices on the web.

Version:
2.2.1.6
Author:
51Degrees.mobi
